page.shortlink: api objects query object type get function
page.description: Returns the type of the index referenced by the object pointer.

section.title: Discussion
section.description: The .TYPE_GET() method returns the type of the index referenced by the object pointer. The index type can be:

item.name: a tag in an index file

section.title: Example
section.example: dim tbl as P dim qry as P tbl = table.open("test") query.filter = "ID <> ''" query.options = "D" qry = tbl.query_create() ? qry.type_get() = 6
